ComicInfo.Summary:
The Elf Queen imprisons Kelsey needing Kelsey's help in controlling the Cyclops - the most powerful creature on the island. Merrick and Xorn mount a rescue attempt but it's onw that will force Kelsey to make an impossible decision. Meanwhile, MASI Island's force field is only hours from failing and the team must figure out an escape plan before the U.S. Government nukes it off the map.
